sourcesContent:
Order Infos
    Order ID: {{orderId}}
  • Order Date: {{orderDetails.billingDate | date:"dd/MM/yyyy"}}
  • Customer ID: {{orderDetails.customer.id}}
  • Customer Name: {{orderDetails.customer.name}}
  • Customer Email: {{orderDetails.customer.email}}
Product Items
Product IdProduct NameQuantityPrice
{{i.id}} Product X{{i.productID}} {{i.quantity}} {{i.price | number : '.2'}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {HttpClient} from "@angular/common/http"; import {ActivatedRoute, Router} from "@angular/router"; @Component({ selector: 'app-order-details', templateUrl: './order-details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./order-details.component.css'] }) export class OrderDetailsComponent implements OnInit { orderDetails :any; orderId!:number; constructor(private http:HttpClient, private router: Router, private route:ActivatedRoute) { this.orderId=route.snapshot.params['orderID']; } ngOnInit(): void { this.http.get("http://localhost:8888/BILLING-SERVICE/bills/full/"+this.orderId) .subscribe({ next : (data)=>{ this.orderDetails=data; }, error : (err)=>{} }); } getOrderDetails(o: any) { this.router.navigateByUrl("/order-details/"+o.id); } }
